prompt: A beautifully detailed lantern entwined with glowing vines, its light casting an eerie, magical glow throughout a mist-filled swamp. This enchanted lantern is held by an ancient statue partially submerged in the murky waters. Vivid green and blue fireflies hover around it, adding to the enigmatic atmosphere. The setting is filled with towering, gnarled trees and luminescent plants that create an otherworldly ambiance, all illustrated in a dark and vibrant fantasy art style.
